main event: On August 8, 1949, at 2000 hours, an unidentified object was sighted over Biloxi, Mississippi.
interesting points: The object appeared to be spherical in shape and had a bright yellowish glow,The observation lasted approximately 20 seconds,The object was estimated to be traveling at a speed between 600 and 800 mph,No sound was detected from the object during the sighting due to background noise from local traffic and aircraft,There were no distinguishing features observed on the object, and it disappeared suddenly.
sighted object: a spherical object with a soft yellowish glow
witness description: 1st Lt of Keesler AFB and one other unnamed witness
